results.message: Successfully applied AI Agent prompt via Claude Code
results.output:
The project structure looks legitimate - it's an EPUB reader application built with Next.js. I can see:

- Standard Next.js app structure with `/app` directory (App Router)
- Component library with UI components
- Authentication and Supabase integration
- Reading features like annotations, progress tracking
- No malicious files detected

The structure matches the CLAUDE.md description of "Arcadia Reader - A feature-complete, modern EPUB reader".
